# Concluded Myers Briggs Personality Type &#8211; [INFP &#8211; Poetic and kind, always eager to help a good cause.](https://www.afriqueunique.org/portrait-of-an-infp-introverted-intuitive-feeling-perceiving-introverted-feeling-with-extraverted-intuition/)

## Net Worth: **$400 million &#8211; 2018**
